General.Name: Yonggu Group Inc
General.Description: Yonggu Group Inc. engages in the production and sale of ready-mixed commercial concrete, fly ash, mortar, and cement. It offers ready-mixed mortar, refined stone powder, reinforced minerals, and composite materials. Yonggu Group Inc. was founded in 1999 is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
